title: How to get your pixel 3 to display notifications on gear fit 2
content:
So I recently upgraded from a galaxy note 5 to a Google Pixel 3 and connected my Gear fit 2 to the pixel 3 seemingly with no issue.
However when I get notifications on my pixel 3 the Gear fit 2 does not display them despite both the phone and the gear fit 2 having "show notifications" turned on. How do I fix this so that my gear fit 2 isn't Just a glorified watch?? 
All advice is appreciated. Thanks.
